questions.question: At resonance, for underdamped system increasing the value of damping would lead to ?

answers.c: increase then decrease in steady state amplitude
answers.d: decrease then increase in steady state amplitude

questions.question: A system with 10kg mass 10N/m stiffness and 2.5Ns/m damping is being operated at 1rad/s if X<sub>st</sub>=1cm what is the value of X<sub>0</sub>?
